title: DOOM CAPTCHA
author: denysvitali
aiHeadline: BREAKING: DOOM CAPTCHA is the newest way to prove you're human, because what's more human than killing demons from hell in a browser window, and who needs actual productivity when you can spend your time shooting virtual monsters all day?

title: 30% drop in O1-preview accuracy when Putnam problems are slightly variated
author: optimalsolver
aiHeadline: In a shocking turn of events, it's been discovered that AI models are actually really bad at math, with a whopping 30% drop in accuracy when faced with slightly varied Putnam problems, because who needs to solve actual math problems when you can just memorize the answers, right?

title: Terence Tao: One of my papers got declined today
author: GavCo
aiHeadline: World-renowned mathematician Terence Tao just had one of his papers rejected, because even geniuses get rejected sometimes, and now he's probably crying himself to sleep at night, wondering what he did wrong, or maybe he's just too busy solving actual math problems to care about a little thing like rejection.

title: Databases in 2024: A Year in Review
author: avinassh
aiHeadline: The year 2024 is finally over, and what a year it was for databases, with all sorts of advancements and breakthroughs that you probably didn't pay attention to, but don't worry, there's a whole blog post about it, so you can catch up on all the exciting developments you missed, and pretend like you care about databases.

title: Books I Loved Reading in 2024
author: simplegeek
aiHeadline: If you're looking for some book recommendations, look no further, because some guy on the internet has compiled a list of his favorite books from 2024, and who doesn't love a good list, especially when it's filled with books you've probably never heard of, but will definitely pretend to have read in order to sound smart at your next dinner party.
